meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #852.

td.p: Blaze Newman, a teacher from Encinitas, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,400)

tr.td: FLAGS
FASHION
POTPOURRI
MAMMALS
SPIRITUAL SONGS
ENDS WITH "A"

[laughter & applause.]
(Alex: I apologize, Liz. I fell asleep.)

Los Angeles

Liz
')

tr.td: PRESIDENTS
1 of 2 20th century presidents who were the only 2 ever sworn in during August
Blaze
Scott
Liz
2-day champion: $14,600
2nd place: trip on Eastern to Tampa Bay & stay at Safety Harbor Spa & Fitness + Jeopardy! box game
3rd place: Maytag washer & dryer + Jeopardy! box game
Blaze
Scott
Liz

9 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)

5 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
